ygData.subject: Re: Bertoxx Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hehe, You dident convince me to do some soloing *Grin* I almost NEVER solo. I hate soloing, its too damned boring IMO. I have started to hunt with groups
ygData.messageBody:
>Message: 10
> Date: Fri, 13 Oct 2000 13:28:33 -0700
> From: John Tatsukawa <john@...>
>Subject: Re: Bertoxx Bards
>
>Aye Musiker is on occasionally. Convinced him to do some soloing in
>Dreadlands. Last I saw, he was 40.
>

Hehe, You dident convince me to do some soloing *Grin* I almost NEVER solo. I
hate soloing, its too damned boring IMO.
I have started to hunt with groups in Dreadlands, on the north wall of karnor to
be precise. I still find that 3 spawn in Overthere gives me better experince
overall + I have just about hunted so many berzerkers that I am able to enter
the outpost without my mask (They con threathingly without the mask) So I think
I will do my last bubble of hell (40th) in OT.
Btw I almost never have problems finding a group. Only problem is that the zones
where people hunt during my playhours, are the same well known zones which is
tottaly crowded during peek hours. I guess thats the curse of playing on the
hours where there is less than 1k people on the server - I seldom get to fight
in the less populated zones like dalnir.

>I tried some hunting in the Emerald Jungle. Easy to fear/chain the iksars.
>Was funny, I tried to charm them and after the 4th failure remembered that
>they can't be charmed. :-)
>
>Can't say the loot has been to great, but not many people in the zone so
>the lag isn't too bad.
>
>Windleaf
>Happily sitting at his 40th song, in no rush to 50. :-)
>

Musiker "wants to get planes capable" Silverdrum
